channel.title: Suggest me a good fictional series
channel.description:
Somebody suggest to me a good series, preferably 3 or more books in the series, that I might be interested in. I'm into medieval, magic, and western.
Yes, i've already read Harry Potter

item.title: Suggest me a good fictional series
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

I’m reading Shan’s Demonata series, so far it’s a great read. I’ll read the prequel when i’m done. My school library doesn’t have it so I have to download pdf’s and put it on my kindle. Thanks for the feedback guys!

Read full topic

item.title: Suggest me a good fictional series
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:19, topic:532189”][quote author=Muroth link=topic=650981.msg4377793#msg4377793 date=1382573894]
Finished Cirque De Freak, great ending. Need a new series now!
[/quote]

Was going to suggest this, was my favorite book series. I have not found another like it that interests me. I haven’t read a book seriously since I finished the series. ;([/quote]
there’s a prequel that follows Mr. Crepsley

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Saga_of_Larten_Crepsley

item.title: Suggest me a good fictional series
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

nolan2131:

Cirque De Freak was my favorite book series awhile back. It actually has a great story. The movie sucked though.

This was a fantastic series, I couldn’t put the books down.

You could try The Vampire Chronicles or Hush, Hush series.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggest me a good fictional series
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

Do it, seriously. I would do it now if I had the time. They just get better and better, which is rare for a book series. Story gets pretty intense!

item.title: Suggest me a good fictional series
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

[quote=“Muroth, post:12, topic:532189”][quote author=nolan2131 link=topic=650981.msg4369828#msg4369828 date=1380382777]
Cirque De Freak was my favorite book series awhile back. It actually has a great story. The movie sucked though.
[/quote]

+10000000

It was my favorite series back in middle school! The movie was alright, not as good as the book.[/quote]

For sure, they only made one movie right? And there were 12 or 11 books? Anyways, I loved those books. One of the few things I could stand to read in middle school haha.

item.title: Suggest me a good fictional series
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:5, topic:532189”]Despite the hype, The Hunger Games series is a decent read though it doesn’t take that long.

Also, i’d look into the Demonata series, i’ve only read the first book (lord loss) but it was fairly interesting.[/quote]
I’ve read a lot of Demonata and it’s a pretty good series. I loved Darren Shan’s vampire series too, Cirque Du Freak
